inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosed with type 1 diabetes at age of hospitalization with glucose value >1000 mg/dL

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: hospitalized for previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis

exclusion.criterion: acute complications such as liver failure
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: lab studies showed AST: 17 U/L and ALT: 14 U/L

exclusion.criterion: incomplete records on the patients file
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 24-year-old man with type 1 diabetes, experiencing hyperglycemia after not taking insulin for 3 days. He has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis and appears well.
